title: Newly purchased pixel 3a camera app freezing
content:
I have been having issues with my pixel 3a camera, specifically when trying to edit the pictures.  Here is what happens:

Take picture

Go to edit picture (light/colour/pop).  

The phone will then do the processing wheel forever.  I can minimize out of the app, but if I go back in it will continue the processing wheel.  If I exit out of the app, when I reopen the app, it will shortly go to a black screen.  I can exit out of that, but the same thing happens if I reopen it.

I have tried:

restarting phone.  This will remove the black screen problem when opening my phone app, but the processing wheel freeze still happens if I try to edit.

I have force stopped the app, and cleared the cache.

Any help would be appreciated.
